unnormalised: Arre yaar, when will this end? Gas cylinder prices are giving us all a serious case of inflation anxiety again. After a brief dip last month thanks to Diwali, Bharat Gas and Indane have announced a slight hike for November.
normalised: Arre yaar, when will this end? Gas cylinder prices are giving us all a serious case of inflation anxiety again. After a brief dip last month thanks to Diwali, Bharat Gas and Indane have announced a slight hike for November.

unnormalised: Sources say prices in Delhi are up by Rs. 50 per cylinder, hitting Rs. 1103. Kolkata folks are feeling the pinch too. Apparently, global crude oil prices are to blame, again.
normalised: Sources say prices in Delhi are up by rupees fifty per cylinder, hitting rupees one thousand one hundred and three. Kolkata folks are feeling the pinch too. Apparently, global crude oil prices are to blame, again.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Indian Oil Corporation says the increase is unavoidable to cover operational costs. Meanwhile, auntyji next door is complaining that her chai budget is taking a hit!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Indian Oil Corporation says the increase is unavoidable to cover operational costs. Meanwhile, auntyji next door is complaining that her chai budget is taking a hit!

unnormalised: This price fluctuation is hitting small businesses, especially dhabas and chai stalls. Imagine the cost for a small restaurant operating in a 500 sq ft space near Chandni Chowk!
normalised: This price fluctuation is hitting small businesses, especially dhabas and chai stalls. Imagine the cost for a small restaurant operating in a five hundred square feet space near Chandni Chowk!

unnormalised: Netizens are already trending #GasPriceHike on Twitter. Let's see what the government does this time. Will subsidies return or will we all have to tighten our belts? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: Netizens are already trending hash Gas Price Hike on Twitter. Let's see what the government does this time. Will subsidies return or will we all have to tighten our belts? Only time will tell. Stay tuned for more updates!
